column2: Binary variable indicating whether an employee has left the company (Yes/No).
Frequency of employee business travel (e.g., Travel_Rarely, Travel_Frequently, Non-Travel).
Categorical variable representing different age groups or bands.
Categorical label for attrition (e.g., Attrition, No Attrition).
The department in which the employee works (e.g., Sales, Human Resources, Research & Development).
Field of education of the employee (e.g., Life Sciences, Medical, Marketing).
Unique identifier for each employee.
Gender of the employee (e.g., Male, Female).
Specific role or position of the employee within the company.
Marital status of the employee (e.g., Single, Married, Divorced).
Whether the employee works overtime (Yes/No).
Binary variable indicating if the employee is over 18 years old (Yes/No).
Number of times the employee was trained last year.
Age of the employee.
Binary variable indicating if the employee is currently employed (Yes/No).
Daily salary rate of the employee.
Distance of the employee's residence from the workplace.
Level of education attained by the employee (e.g., Bachelor's, Master's, Doctorate).
Number of employees (typically a constant value for all records).
Level of satisfaction with the work environment.
Hourly salary rate of the employee.
Level of involvement or engagement in the job.
Level of the employee's job within the company hierarchy.
Level of satisfaction with the job.
Monthly income of the employee.
Monthly salary rate of the employee.
Number of companies the employee has worked for.
Percentage increase in salary compared to the previous year.
Rating of the employee's performance.
Level of satisfaction with relationships at work.
Standard working hours per day.
Level of stock options granted to the employee.
Total number of years the employee has worked.
Level of balance between work and personal life.
Number of years the employee has been with the current company.
Number of years the employee has been in the current role.
Number of years since the employee's last promotion.
Number of years the employee has been with the current manager
